job.title: Data Scientist Jr
job.description:
YOUR NEXT STEP IS AT RAPPI!

Rappi is one of the first Latin American unicorns and a start-up that continues to focus on growing and making life easier for our users. As a company, we seek to continue improving the services we already offer, add more to our offer and continue expanding throughout the Latin American continent.

Rappi is the fastest growing Latin American startup, backed by the world's top investors, including Sequoia, Andreesen Horowitz, Y Combinator and Softbank. We reached unicorn status last year and haven't slowed down. We operate in 100+ cities across 9 countries in Latin America, with large hubs in Mexico City, Bogotá, São Paulo, and Buenos Aires.

At Rappi, no two days are the same. We love to hustle, work hard for a greater good and strive to be the leading tech company in Latin America. Rappi is growing at a tremendous rate and this position is crucial in our pursuit of a game-changing experience for our users and partners.

Main Responsibilities
  • Assists with deep data sets analysis for operations and management decisions
  • Create, maintain, and optimize reports including SQL statements, views, functions, and stored procedures
  • Synthesize large, complex data sets into impactful insights and build analytical stories that shape the operations roadmap and culminate in strategic business decisions
  • Work with product management teams to process client’s requests and help translate this feedback into product requirements
Key Requirements
  • Bachelor's degree in Mathematics, Data Management, Marketing, Statistics, Physics, Computer Science, a related field, minimum 3+ years’ experience working on business analytics projects (preferred)
  • Experience working with large data sets and strong practical knowledge of analytical techniques
  • Strong knowledge building dashboards on Data studio o Power BI
  • Experience in data analysis, reporting, market research, segmentation and data modeling
  • Demonstrated analytical and problem-solving skills, with a bias for action, integrity, and accountability
  • Strong teamwork and client service orientation
  • Strong SQL skills
  • Fluent in English (written & spoken)
